resources.string: Enter your registered email to reset password

3.2 You agree to (a) keep your password confidential and user only your email and password when logging in, (b) immediately notify Ecolution of any unauthorised use of your Account (c), ensure that your Account information is accurate and up-to-date.

3.1 Some functions of our Services require registration for an Account by selecting a unique registered email and password, and by providing certain personal information. If you select a User ID that is offensive or inappropriate, Ecolution has the right to suspend or terminate your Account.
2.1 Your privacy is very important to us at Ecolution. To better protect your rights, your information and data will not be shared to any third parties.

1.3 Before becoming a User of the application, you must read and accept all of the terms and conditions in, and linked to, these Terms of Service and you must consent to the processing of your personal data.

1.2 The Services include an platform service that provides a place and opportunity for recycling practices between Recycling Station and the users. Ecolution reserves the right to remove any Content or information uploaded by you on the application.

1.1 Welcome to Ecolution. Please read the following Terms of Service carefully before using this application or registering an Ecolution account so that you are aware of your legal rights and obligations with respect to Ecolution.

At Ecolution, we dedicated to increasing community awareness, promoting Mother Earth\'s conservation, conveying the severity of ecosystem destruction, and spreading nature\'s beauty. Join us in preserving and protecting for a sustainable future.
The recycling rate in the United States has increased from less than 7% in 1960 to over 34% in 2015. While the progress is promising, we still have a long way to go...
Recycling is important in today’s world if we want to leave this planet for our future generations. It is good for the environment...
Reduce, Reuse, Recycle — Three great ways YOU can eliminate waste and protect your environment! The environment is everything around you including the air, plants,...
Seven ways to improve your recycling habits 1. Use less plastic. One of the easiest ways to use less plastic includes having a personal zero ...
The environment consists of all things-living or nonliving that influence human life. It plays a vital role in the functioning of our daily lives...
